Detailed Description

Statistics gathered during NessieOcr execution stages.

This abstract base class provides a common interface for every stage of NessieOcr, allowing its redefinition so that derived classes can be customized according to the stage they belong. The statitical data is gathered mostly in internal algorithms, and provides time results among other parameters.

See also:
PreprocessorStatistics, FeatureExtractorStatistics, ClassifierStatistics
